item.title: The best ebook reader to buy right now
item.description:

item.title: Google’s NotebookLM enhances AI note-taking with YouTube, audio file sources, sharable audio discussions
item.description:
Google's NotebookLM has been updated with YouTube and audio files as new source types and sharable links for Audio Overviews.

item.title: These iPhone Apps Put the Dynamic Island to Good Use
Your LG TV will reportedly display screensaver ads. How to turn them off.
item.description: LG televisions are starting to show ads when not in active use. Thankfully, you can shut that down.

item.title: These are the best early October Prime Day deals that cost under $50
item.description: The Blink Outdoor 4 security camera, Soundcore Anker headphones, and Fire TV streaming stick are all under $50 at Amazon's October Prime Day sale.

item.title: Amazon just dropped prices on a bunch of Bluetooth speakers for Prime Big Deal Days
item.description: Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days is coming Oct. 8 and 9. Shop early deals on Bluetooth speakers from JBL, Sony, and Ultimate Ears.
